description: This file contains asynchronous Python code that defines functions to generate reports on AI providers using an agent-based system, and includes a main function to execute these tasks concurrently.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of performing tasks with specified models and tools.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from an agent after executing a task.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for querying DuckDuckGo within the agent.

methods.name: get_agent
methods.description: Creates an agent and requests it to generate a report on a specified AI provider after a delay.

methods.name: get_reports
methods.description: Coordinates multiple get_agent calls to generate reports on various AI providers concurrently.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main asynchronous function that runs the report generation and prints the results.
